title: Bushisms...
body: "Recession means that people's incomes, at the employer level, are going down, basically, relative to costs, people are getting laid off."—Washington, D.C., Feb. 19, 2004<br><br>Now I know that if I were to talk as much as the president does, I'd probably say some stupid things.  But <a href="http://slate.msn.com/id/76886/">this guy is the commander in chief of the most powerful army in the world</a>.  After reading those quotes, who would be able to vote for him?  Dan Quayle and Yogi Berra can't hold a candle to him.  His term isn't even up yet and he's already had 3 books and a calendar published full of only the stupid shit that he's said.
bodyArticleHtml:
—Washington, D.C., Feb. 19, 2004

Now I know that if I were to talk as much as the president does, I'd probably say some stupid things. But
